channel.title: Removing LPOTM
channel.description:
It just didn't work out as I expected.
We got 1 entry... in the course of 3 weeks, and it was mine. And we aren't getting that many people in SOTW either, soon enough i may remove that too. Its taking 2 weeks for people to enter 5 sigs.
I think the community itself is falling apart...

item.title: Removing LPOTM
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

As Thug said, it’s getting near time for exams and the holidays, so I’m not really surprised that there has been a lull in entries.

Read full topic

I was mainly commenting on the comment about his grammar and sentence fluency.
[/quote]
why do you hates me?

Do you guys want me to leave? stfu exe you can’t tell me to leave…
[/quote]

Fellix, stop being such a immature fucker, either deal with it or gtfo. Exe r sexy.[/quote]
You also have grammar and spelling, I am not on anyones side, just shut-up and stay out of it.

LPOTM

Yes LPOTM is failing and so is SOTW.

Maybe after a couple weeks SOTW shall be revocated :(.
